## ASTNode.createBlockNode() method

Creates an AST node pointing to a block.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static createBlockNode(block: Block): ASTNode | null;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  block | [Block](./blockly.block.md) | The block used to create an AST node.  An AST node pointing to a block. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[ASTNode](./blockly.astnode.md) \| null
